While most of the doctors told me that my situation was such that there is a very little chance to continue with my pregnancy, Dr Hirday handled my case very well. Wish the best for her always!

review: She is polite and has good experience but the things which I didn't like is.. she recommended lots of *********** medical tests costing more than 25000 **** **** * *** ** ************** Though I visited her for my pregnancy consultations many times (paid 1000 rs consultation fee every time) but when I called her on phone for some medical suggestion she absolutely denied saying that if I can suggest you on phone how all these hospitals will run.. which was very rude.. **** **** ***** *** ****** **** **** ******** ******* *** *** *** ** **** ******** *** **** ** **** **** ******
